16 #ifndef AACE_LOGGER_LOGGER_ENGINE_INTERFACES_H
17 #define AACE_LOGGER_LOGGER_ENGINE_INTERFACES_H
18 
19 #include <string>
20 #include <iostream>
21 
24 namespace aace {
25 namespace logger {
26 
30 class LoggerEngineInterface {
31 public:
32 
36  enum class Level {
37 
41  VERBOSE,
42 
46  INFO,
47 
51  METRIC,
52 
56  WARN,
57 
61  ERROR,
62 
66  CRITICAL
67  };
68 
69  virtual void log( Level level, const std::string& tag, const std::string& message ) = 0;
70 };
71 
72 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream, const LoggerEngineInterface::Level& level) {
73  switch (level) {
74  case LoggerEngineInterface::Level::VERBOSE:
75  stream << "VERBOSE";
76  break;
77  case LoggerEngineInterface::Level::INFO:
78  stream << "INFO";
79  break;
80  case LoggerEngineInterface::Level::METRIC:
81  stream << "METRIC";
82  break;
83  case LoggerEngineInterface::Level::WARN:
84  stream << "WARN";
85  break;
86  case LoggerEngineInterface::Level::ERROR:
87  stream << "ERROR";
88  break;
89  case LoggerEngineInterface::Level::CRITICAL:
90  stream << "CRITICAL";
91  break;
92  }
93  return stream;
94 }

96 } // aace::logger
97 } // aace
